name: UITextField.ViewMode
desc: Constants that define when overlay views appear in a text field.

items.name: case whileEditing
items.desc: The overlay view is displayed only while text is being edited in the text field.

items.name: case unlessEditing
items.desc: The overlay view is displayed only when text is not being edited.

items.name: case always
items.desc: The overlay view is always displayed if the text field contains text.
